1081401.desc:
Turn End: Inflict [RetaliationBook] to the enemy that dealt the most Skill damage to an ally this turn

Every time this unit is hit by an enemy, gain 2 [ResentmentIshmael] (2 times per turn)
When an other The Middle-faction ally is hit by an enemy, gain 1 [ResentmentIshmael] (once per turn per Identity)

Gain 1 [ReinforcedTattooIshmael] every time this unit consumes 5 [ResentmentIshmael] (2 times per turn)

Combat Start: If this unit does not have [HeatingWireIshmael], and at 3+ Envy Reson., gain 2 [HeatingWireIshmael] next turn
Combat Start: If this unit has [HeatingWireIshmael], gain (Envy Reson. / 3) [HeatingWireIshmael] at Turn End (max 2)
1081401.name: The Middle Never Forgets, Y'know?

1081402.desc:
This unit is considered as an Identity that inflicts [Combustion] and [Laceration].
If this unit has [HeatingWireIshmael], Skills that inflict [Laceration] are considered as Skills that inflict both [Combustion] and [Laceration].
1081402.name: Thermal Weapon

1081411.desc:
Turn End: Inflict [RetaliationBook] to the enemy that dealt the most Skill damage to an ally this turn

Every time this unit is hit by an enemy, gain 2 [ResentmentIshmael] (2 times per turn)
When an other The Middle-faction ally is hit by an enemy, gain 1 [ResentmentIshmael] (once per turn per Identity)
- If the target that attacked this unit or an ally has [RetaliationBook], gain 1 more [ResentmentIshmael]
- Combat Start: If the Dashboard has Envy A-Reson., double the amount of [ResentmentIshmael] gained this turn

Gain 1 [ReinforcedTattooIshmael] every time this unit consumes 5 [ResentmentIshmael] (2 times per turn)

Combat Start: If this unit does not have [HeatingWireIshmael], and at 3+ Envy Reson., gain 2 [HeatingWireIshmael] next turn
Combat Start: If this unit has [HeatingWireIshmael], gain (Envy Reson. / 3) [HeatingWireIshmael] at Turn End (max 2)
1081411.name: The Middle Never Forgets, Y'know?

1081421.desc:
Clash Power +1 for #1 Deployed Identity's Base Attack Skills (once per turn)
If the Dashboard has Envy A-Reson., #1 Deployed Identity deals +10% damage with Base Skills
1081421.name: Hey, Are Ya Into Fixers, Too?

[StartBattle] This Skill gains Offense Level by (highest Reson. / 2) (max 3; rounded down)

data.desc:
If target has 6+ ([Combustion] + [Laceration]), Coin Power +1
[StartBattle] This Skill gains Offense Level by (highest Reson. / 2) (max 3; rounded down)
[WhenUse] If this unit has [HeatingWireIshmael], On Hit with 1st, 2nd, and 4th Coins, inflict [Combustion] by the base amount of [Laceration] this Skill inflicts
[WhenUse] At 5+ [ResentmentIshmael], Final Power +1
[EndSkill] Consume all [ResentmentIshmael] on self
data.name: Violet~ Breaking Slam

descs: [OnSucceedAttack] Deal (Envy Reson. x 5)% of this Coin's final damage as Slash bonus damage (max 30%)

data.desc:
If target has 6+ ([Combustion] + [Laceration]), Coin Power +1
[StartBattle] This Skill gains Offense Level by (highest Reson. / 2) (max 3; rounded down)
- If there was an A-Reson. in the Reson. chain, double the amount of Offense Level gained from the above effect
